text:
Hi,
is there anyway to create a  Login Authentication Page..need to implement on my website

Any idea ?

Hey <@U01GV4Y1T9P> Which HubSpot Api are you trying to access? The Path of the API woudl be helpful.

Any examples you could share so I can see more specifically what’s going on?  I’m not sure I’m following you as it almost sounds like the error isn’t coming from HubSpot but from your .net API
If you are looking for something like gated content for a page, check out this article: <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/cms-pages-editor/control-audience-access-to-pages>
